audioText: Les femmes que j'ai connues dans ce milieu professionnel étaient toutes formidables, mais elles semblaient parfois pâles de fatigue.
question: What does the speaker say about the women they knew?
options: They were all wonderful but sometimes seemed pale with fatigue
They were competitive and always energetic at work
They were unfriendly and difficult to work with
They were inexperienced but eager to learn
explanation: The text states 'Les femmes que j'ai connues dans ce milieu professionnel étaient toutes formidables, mais elles semblaient parfois pâles de fatigue' - The women I knew in this professional environment were all wonderful, but they sometimes seemed pale with fatigue. The verb 'connues' (past participle of 'connaître') agrees with the feminine plural 'femmes'.
source: Strategic question targeting missing conjugate 'connues' with synergistic vocabulary
